Hero.heading: Hi, I'm Frank
Hero.text1: Proficient in React and Next.js, I've spent the last 3 years building websites.
Hero.text2: In my free time, I dive into side projects to broaden my technological skills.
Hero.text3: Let's bring your projects to life.
